portfoliia.title: Portfoliia - Saas
portfoliia.description: I created Portfoliia to make building professional portfolios and resumes simple and fast. This CMS-powered platform has empowered several users to create stunning portfolios and includes insightful analytics to track their performance. Portfoliia also earned the #1 Product of the Day badge on Faizer.
slideShowImages: /assets/images/portfoliia/Screenshot 2025-09-16 at 02-39-50 Divine-Vessel O - Lead Full Stack Software Developer @ Skiyen Portfolio Portfoliia.png
/assets/images/portfoliia/Screenshot 2025-09-16 at 02-40-04 Divine-Vessel O - Lead Full Stack Software Developer @ Skiyen Resume Portfoliia.png

fluxnet.title: Fluxinet – Saas
fluxnet.description: I built Fluxinet to solve a real problem I noticed among small business owners around me. Managing inventory was chaotic, often done with pen and paper or clunky spreadsheets. I wanted to make something simple, clean, and efficient. Since launching, several Nigerian businesses have started using it to digitalize their store book keeping and streamline their operations.

marokug.title: Marokug
marokug.description: At Marokug, I collaborated with a team to create an online learning platform. Marokug empowers students to explore and learn a wide range of courses at their own pace, test their understanding through interactive quizzes and exams, and deepen their knowledge with additional learning materials.

mtalers.title: Mtalers
mtalers.description: Mtalers is an educational blog developed for a client, focusing on providing a comprehensive learning experience. It incorporates various technologies such as jQuery, Php and MySql to deliver interactive and engaging educational content. The platform aims to enhance the learning process through its user-friendly interface and extensive functionality.

geegpayFrontendChallenge.title: Geegpay Frontend Challenge
geegpayFrontendChallenge.description: I converted a Figma design to code in the Geegpay Design and Front-End Challenge @ 2024. My main goals were achieving a pixel-perfect design, ensuring it was fully responsive, and implementing dynamic charts using Chart.js.

strender.title: Strender
strender.description: I originally built Strender as a sports hub, but it’s grown into a full-on news platform. Now it supports all kinds of news: sports, politics, tech, etc. It pulls in real-time updates, live scores, and highlights, and I introduced an anonymous commenting so users can speak freely without filters. It’s my personal take on what a modern news platform should feel like.
